dublin_core.dcvalue: Digital Technologies Supporting Data for Decision making in Asia During this session speakers will highlight data use strategies applied in the Asia region Come to hear how IntraHealth has applied Google Analytics to provide real time monitoring for community health worker productivity in India By using data from the mSakhi mobile application IntraHealth identified issues to improve health worker performance across the maternal neonatal and child health continuum of care You ll also hear the USAID funded Health Systems Strengthening HSS Component of the Maternal and Child Health Program developed a digital dashboard as a mechanism to strengthen the health system in Sindh Province Pakistan The integrated dashboard serves as Sindh s provincial dashboard and provides the opportunity for desk based real time data monitoring Finally learn about the Fionet system that combines cloud based information services smartphone tablet applications and the Deki Reader to provides step by step guidance and objective analysis of rapid diagnostic tests This platform developed by Fio allows field data that has been collected to be used by supervisors program managers and other stakeholders to provide real time oversight over health care workers Presented by Nancy Brady MPH Technical Advisor John Snow Inc
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-22T10:36:35Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 nancy_brady_-_pakistan_hss_brady_120317.pdf: 1975171 bytes, checksum: 1b3f64f41d642322719617c7773d3849 (MD5)
Integrating Digital Dashboards for Health System Strengthening: The Case of Sindh Province, Pakistan
